product.product_title: K KIP WOK Chunky Sneakers for Women Fashion Platform White Leather Casual Dad Shoes Comfortable Wedge Walking Sport Sneakers
product.cushioning: Plush memory foam insole molds to the foot for personalized comfort, supported by the thick platform.
product.breathability: Smooth white leather upper is not breathable; the chunky design prioritizes style.
product.short_description: Make a bold fashion statement with the K KIP WOK Chunky Sneakers for Women. These platform sneakers are designed for the trend-forward woman who loves the '90s-inspired "dad shoe" aesthetic and wants to stand out with a look that's both edgy and comfortable. The shoe features a striking, multi-layered construction with a smooth white leather upper, creating a clean yet substantial look that dominates any outfit. The defining characteristic is the incredibly chunky platform sole, which provides a significant lift of approximately 3.15 inches. This towering sole not only adds a dramatic, fashion-forward element but also offers a stable, cushioned base for all-day wear. Inside, a plush memory foam insole molds to your foot, delivering personalized comfort and support with every step. Whether you're pairing them with wide-leg pants, a midi skirt, or cropped jeans, these K KIP WOK sneakers are the ultimate statement piece for the woman who dares to be different.
product.about_this_item: MEASUREMENTS: Height of lightweight platform sole is approximately 3.15inch (8 cm)... COMFORTABLE: Soft synthetic PU... Memory foam insole... UNIQUE DESGIN... OCCASION... AFTER-SALES SERVICE...
